name: Deep Station Fine
description:
Welcome aboard Deep Station Fine Commander. You and your officers will embark on a great adventure about Klongons. Lt.Wax, a freightful Science Officer, Chef O´Bran an always horny engineer, Gunslinger Joe the rambling security guy and Doctor P, the doctor aboard the station with a small alcohol problem.
This game was made for Ludum Dare 45: start with nothing
You only need a mouse to play it. Consult your officers and choose your orders wisely.
This is a space parody heavily inspired by Star Trek DS9 with strong language.
